properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen Bank National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 2 at 12:40AM EST until February 3 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 5 to 15 kt and seas 3 to 5 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen
Bank National Marine Sanctuary.

* WHEN...From 4 AM early this morning to 6 PM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 6 PM EST MONDAY
